#summary EcmaScript 5

For this project, JavaScript refers to [http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-262.htm EcmaScript 5th edition].  It will run JavaScript on a beta version of [http://www.mozilla.org/rhino/ Rhino] that supports 5th edition features such as Object freezing until such time as a full 5th edition interpreter is available.
